params.uri: IPFS CID with the off-chain data of the quest

returns._0: The id of the newly created quest.

params.questId: The id of the quest to edit
params.uri: IPFS CID with the off-chain data of the quest

returns._0: the address of the daoExpander contract that uses this module.

createTask(uint256,uint256,string).notice: Creates a task in relation to a quest

getTimeOfCompletion(address,uint256).notice: gets timestamp of completion of the quest, if quest not completed - it returns 0

hasCompletedAQuest(address,uint256).notice: Checks if a specific user has completed a quest by ID

hasCompletedQuestForRole(address,uint256.notice: Checks if a user has completed a quest. This one is used for onboarding, when the user doesn't yet have a role

isOngoing(uint256).notice: Checks if a quest is ongoing

isPending(uint256).notice: Checks if a quest is pending

novaAddress().notice: A plugin contract is deployed for each daoExpander that uses it. When a plugin is associated to a daoExpander, the address is set by the DAOExpander.

setActiveQuestPerRole(uint256,uint256).notice: sets the active quest per role

documentation.text:
@notice gets total amount of quests
 @return uint256.
